channel.title: DARK & LOVELY: Deep, Soulful House Music
channel.description: the dark and lovely project is a multidisc series of deep, soulful, underground house music and electronica compilations. the syncopated rhythms, lush soundscapes, and ambient interludes of dark and lovely invite you to--in the words of diamondancer --"elevate your mind and set your body free." featured artists and remixers include the messenger, bioground, soulphiction, imotion, moodyman, beat pharmacy, deep house souldiers, theo parrish, fresh & low, osunlade, roy ayers, boobjazz, sunkiss, spiritual blessings, sns project, dj rasoul, afefe iku, shur-i-kan, vincenzo, schmoov!, mo' horizons, fred everything, the timewriter, karizma, dj aakmael, jimpster, blue deep, sunshine jones, dubtribe sound system, kevin yost, julius papp, the rurals, kelvin k, arnold jarvis, patchwork, david alvarado, harley & muscle, adny, crazy penis, c&m productions, and frankie knuckles. deep house!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Deep, soulful, underground house music
channel.itunes:author: soultripper
channel.itunes:summary: the dark and lovely project is a multidisc series of deep, soulful, underground house music and electronica compilations. the syncopated rhythms, lush soundscapes, and ambient interludes of dark and lovely invite you to--in the words of diamondancer --"elevate your mind and set your body free." featured artists and remixers include the messenger, bioground, soulphiction, imotion, moodyman, beat pharmacy, deep house souldiers, theo parrish, fresh & low, osunlade, roy ayers, boobjazz, sunkiss, spiritual blessings, sns project, dj rasoul, afefe iku, shur-i-kan, vincenzo, schmoov!, mo' horizons, fred everything, the timewriter, karizma, dj aakmael, jimpster, blue deep, sunshine jones, dubtribe sound system, kevin yost, julius papp, the rurals, kelvin k, arnold jarvis, patchwork, david alvarado, harley & muscle, adny, crazy penis, c&m productions, and frankie knuckles. deep house!
